content: due to the way you need to fit squares together to fit the wearer it is hard to make a traditional pattern with a variety of sizes this is just the process i followed to make my cardigan with instructions on how to size the garment to fit please note that unlike my paid patterns this recipe is not properly graded for sizes tested or proof read so i am making it available for free if you have any questions or spot any typos please feel free to email me at insertinnergeek@gmail com
